sentences.en: At the utterance of Miss Temple's name, a soft smile flitted over her grave face.
sentences.cn: 一听到谭波尔小姐的名字, 一丝温柔的微笑掠过她那严肃的脸.

sentences.en: But she had no utterance, and was obliged to leave all to their own discretion.
sentences.cn: 然而她语言梗塞, 只得任她们自行决断.

sentences.en: Every solemn, " official " utterance can be paired with another that is sharply irreverent.
sentences.cn: 有一本正经的 “ 官方 ” 意见,就有另外一种玩世不恭的意见.

sentences.en: His every utterance will be scrutinized.
sentences.cn: 他说的每句话都会被仔细审查。

sentences.en: I crammed my mouth with stirabout for fear I might give utterance to my anger.
sentences.cn: 我生怕自己会吐出气愤的声音,拼命往嘴里喂麦片粥.

sentences.en: Law is an utterance determined by the common consent of the commonwealth.
sentences.cn: 法律是全体公民一致同意所决定的意见之表达.

sentences.en: Miss Brooke knows that they are apt to become feeble in his. utterance.
sentences.cn: 布鲁克小姐明白,他的话一出口, 就变得味同嚼蜡了.

sentences.en: My voice cleaves to my throat, and sob chokes my utterance.
sentences.cn: 我的噪子哽咽, 泣不成声.

sentences.en: Politicians are judged by their public utterances.
sentences.cn: 人们根据政治家公开的言论来评判他们。

sentences.en: Some unwise suggestions also found utterance at the meeting.
sentences.cn: 一些不高明的意见也在会上提了出来.

sentences.en: The ladies smiled approvingly, for his lightest utterance was regarded as incontrovertible truth.
sentences.cn: 妇女们赞赏地笑着, 因为他这么轻松的口气听起来就是不容辩驳的真理.

sentences.en: There was a momentary silence , profound as what should follow the utterance of oracles.
sentences.cn: 那一刹那的静穆,如同宣告了神谕之后一般深沉.

sentences.en: These are by no means identical utterance; but there is a marked resemblance.
sentences.cn: 这些话并不尽同, 可是极其相似.

sentences.en: These two utterances communicate the same message.
sentences.cn: 这两句话传递同样的信息。

sentences.en: This utterance of his was greeted with bursts of uproarious laughter.
sentences.cn: 他的讲话引起阵阵哄然大笑.

sentences.en: To emit ( an utterance or a sound ) loudly and harshly.
sentences.cn: 大声而刺耳地发出 ( 叫唤或声音 )

sentences.en: to give utterance to your thoughts

words.tran_cn: 完全的；彻底的；无条件的

trans.tran_cn: 说话方式，表达，说话，发言
trans.tran_en: Someone's utterances are the things that they say
